name: Jisai
text: ...Phew. That's taken care of.
After we had once again eliminated the monsterーthe Shadowーthat had been hiding, Shishigami let out a sigh.

name: Shonosuke
text: You said you are called Shishigami Jisai? Your skills are splendid.

name: Jisai
text: Not really... and it doesn't make me happy to be complimented by you.
Shishigami said, looking displeased.
As expected, she had never let her guard down, seemingly continuing to pay attention to Shonosuke's movements even throughout the fight with the Will-o'-wisps.

name: Me
text: (And yet, she's this strong... she's just like a fierce god.)
It wasn't just Shishigami. Shonosuke's strength was on par with hers as well.
He had continuously slashed at the Will-o'-wisps with his flowing sword style and driven them away in no time at all.

name: Me
text: (If these guys were in my unit, things would be easier for me... but now's not the time for that.)
There was something we had to do before the Will-o'-wisps started sprouting up again.

name: Me
text: Sorry to cut to the chase, but let's search through the store. We've gotta find a clue to get out of this stupid trap.
Why hadn't the shop owner, the black market broker, shown up?
The answer to that was down the stairs at the back of the store.

name: Jisai
text: Is this... the owner...?
Shishigami looked at the corpse lying in a pool of blood and furrowed her brow as she spoke softly.
The semi-basement of the store had been turned into a study and the bloody body was lying in one corner of it.

name: Me
text: So... this is your doing, Shonosuke?
While walking down the stairs, we had received a brief explanation from Shonosuke.

name: Shonosuke
text: Yes. This man is the one who tried to trap me. He was quite skilled, so I couldn't capture him alive.

name: Me
text: I see―
According to his explanation from earlier, Shonosuke had been pursuing an underboss of the Nisha Clan who had suddenly disappeared, and he had ended up at this store.
Then he had gotten into a fight with the owner and been forced to strike him downー

name: Shonosuke
text: According to what I was able to get out of him before his death, he seems to have been commissioned by "Dragon Gate."

name: Me
text: Dragon Gate... Well, you guys picked a pretty spectacular fight with them.
Just a few days ago, Gaiza and his Nisha Clan had stolen some territory from Dragon Gate using a dangerous Zombie gas.
But of course Dragon Gate would not back down quietly.

name: Shonosuke
text: That is painfully true...  Anyway, this man targeted me and Onigumo Saburo, both of us subordinates of Gaiza-sama.

name: Shonosuke
text: To that end, he set up this magical trapーa space cut off from everything with no way out.

name: Me
text: Hmm...
Onigumo Saburo was an underboss of the Nisha Clan, like Shonosuke.
This black market broker who was targeting two Nisha Clan underbosses...
And Shishigami Jisai, a Taimanin of Gosha Academy, who was lured here with "information about the Nisha Clan"ー
The dots were starting to get connected, and the outline of the situation became clear.

name: Me
text: (He wanted them to kill each otherー)
The trap was not just Will-o'-wisps and Shadows.
He locked up opposing Taimanin of Gosha Academy and the Nisha Clan in the same enclosed space.
If things had gone according to his calculations, in all likelihood Shishigami and Shonosuke would have ended up killing each other.
...By coincidence, I had appeared as an anomaly.

name: Me
text: (C'mon man... I come back to life and bam, I'm wrapped up in such pleasant things once again.)
"Sheesh," I thought with a bitter laugh to myself.

name: Shonosuke
text: ...Kotaro-sama?

name: Me
text: Ah, sorry. I was just lost in thought. ーPlease continue.

name: Shonosuke
text: Yes. So... according to his last words, this enclosed space seems to be a magical trap called the "Crossroads of Confusion."

name: Me
text: The "Crossroads of Confusion"...

name: Shonosuke
text: He said that he had asked a prominent sorcerer of Amidahara to create it, and that we would never be able dispel it. He made that remark and then perished.

name: Me
text: I mean, he tried to kill two Nisha underbosses. Of course he would at least prepare something of that level.
He must have even prepared so thoroughly that the trap would function even if he got killed.

name: Me
text: By the way... Onigumo Saburo? That old man is still alive?
I was acquainted with most of the extended Fuma relations.
I often got yelled at by the old codger of the Onigumo Clan for playing pranks on him when I was a kid.

name: Shonosuke
text: No, he has been replaced, and now a lovely girl has inherited his name.

name: Me
text: You mean his granddaughter!? So the one who disappeared wasー!?

name: Shonosuke
text: The current Onigumo Saburo... She should be somewhere in this store. At least according to the information I picked up.

name: Me
text: Hmm... Or maybe according to the information you were "made to pick up."
The same as with Shishigami, it could be that the owner had leaked the information in order to lure Shonosuke here.

name: Jisai
text: Fuma, look at this.
At that moment, Shishigami, who had been silently examining the room, called out to me.

name: Me
text: Is thatーa hidden passage?
Hidden behind a giant bookcase, a narrow passage led further in.

name: Shonosuke
text: It's definitely a passage...

name: Me
text: Yeah... So this must be the main part of the trap. It's just like the "Biography of the Witch" said.

name: Jisai
text: ...? Do you know anything about this?

name: Me
text: No, but I've read a book before that mentioned the "Crossroads of Confusion."
It was a biography that was said to be written about a witch who really existed.

name: Me
text: A vicious witch created a spell to tame a malevolent deity she had summoned.

name: Me
text: She created a labyrinth from which nobody could ever escape and locked the malevolent deity inside. In the end, the malevolent deity gave up and made a contract with herー

name: Jisai
text: So that spell is the "Crossroads of Confusion"...?

name: Me
text: Yeah. I thought it was just fiction though and didn't expect it to be an actual spell.
Though, sneaking bits of truth into something fabricated was common in the underworld.

name: Shonosuke
text: You are very knowledgeable, Kotaro-sama. ...And what did the book say about it?

name: Me
text: The witch in the biography said: "Enter the labyrinth and seek the exit."

name: Jisai
text: ...I guess that means we just have to go.

name: Shonosuke
text: I see. I hope we can make it out before evening...
When we proceeded through the hidden passage, we found a strange area you wouldn't imagine was underground.
It was a gorgeous room, like a medieval noble's manor.
There were doors on all four sides, each with a small engraving of the respective cardinal direction, and behind each door a series of rooms of the exact same construction.

name: Shonosuke
text: Now, before we proceed, I have a suggestion.
Just as we had resolved to step into the labyrinth, Shonosuke spoke up.

name: Me
text: What is it?

name: Shonosuke
text: How about a temporary ceasefire until we escape?

name: Me
text: A ceasefire? I have no intention of fighting you now anyway.

name: Shonosuke
text: I meant the girl over there. She's been staring at me with murderous intent since some time ago. As such, you must be restless as well.

name: Jisai
text: Well... of course! You're an underboss of the rebellious Nisha Clan...

name: Me
text: Hmm... Shishigami, you don't have to worry about Shonosuke.

name: Jisai
text: Fuma?? What are you saying!?

name: Me
text: It would be simple to fight with Shonosuke here, but when it comes to fighting the Will-o'-wisps, I want more fighting ability, even just one more person.

name: Jisai
text: B-But... you said it yourself, didn't you!? That this guy might be an assassin!

name: Me
text: Yeah, I did. But now I think he isn't... probably.

name: Shonosuke
text: Kotaro-sama, thank you for trusting meー
Shonosuke showed an immeasurably gentle smile.
I walked over to him, grabbed him by the chest, and pulled him close.

name: Shonosuke
text: !? Kotaro-sama...?
The eyes of the man who was always calm wavered slightly.

name: Me
text: ...Listen closely, Shonosuke. I got killed by Gaiza once.

name: Shonosuke
text: But... you are still alive. How...?

name: Me
text: Who knows!! But let me tell you something, Shonosuke!!! I will meet Gaiza again!! And I will grab that guy by the collar and bring him back to Gosha!!

name: Shonosuke
text: Kotaro-sama...

name: Me
text: It's not just because of the mission. It's because that's what IーFuma Kotaroーhave to do!! ...Do you understand, Shonosuke?

name: Shonosuke
text: ...I think your wish will go unfulfilled.

name: Me
text: Shut up. I'll kill those who stand in my way. Even you, who I thought of like an older brother when we were kids.
Shonosuke's eyes narrowed like blades.
Shishigami's hand reached for her sword. The situation was on a hair triggerーbut...

name: Shonosuke
text: My goal is to save Saburo. Nothing else.

name: Me
text: Is it? Then there's no problem.
I gave a wry smile and let go of him.
Then I turned to Shishigami who was on full alert and nodded to show her that everything was fine.

name: Me
text: ...Shonosuke. Do you think Saburo is still alive?
His momentary intent to kill had dissipated and Shonosuke had returned to his normal calm self.

name: Shonosuke
text: She's not a girl who would die from something like this.

name: Me
text: Hehe, that's true. I can't stand her but she's part of the clan, so we'll help her out while we're at it.

name: Shonosuke
text: Thank you. ...But Kotaro-sama, you have changed quite a bit.

name: Me
text: Well, I've been through a lot. Of course I'd change.
As I shrugged, I made eye contact with the dumbfounded Shishigami.

name: Jisai
text: Are you two really enemies? ...You guys are strange.
